TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CounterSample extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 定義為效能計數器保留未經處理資料 (Raw Data) 的結構。

span.span: Defines a structure that holds the raw data for a performance counter.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別顯示效能計數器資料。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to display data for a performance counter. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 結構的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Diagnostics.CounterSample (rawValue, baseValue, counterFrequency, systemFrequency, timeStamp, timeStamp100nSec, counterType)

param.name: rawValue
param.span: 與效能計數器樣本相關聯的數值。

span.span: The numeric value associated with the performance counter sample.

param.name: baseValue
param.span: 計數器的選擇性、未經處理的基底值，只使用於樣本是根據多個計數器時。

span.span: An optional, base raw value for the counter, to use only if the sample is based on multiple counters.

param.name: counterFrequency
param.span: 讀取計數器的頻率。

span.span: The frequency with which the counter is read.

param.name: systemFrequency
param.span: 系統從計數器讀取所使用的頻率。

span.span: The frequency with which the system reads from the counter.

param.name: timeStamp
param.span: 未經處理的時間戳記。

span.span: The raw time stamp.

param.name: timeStamp100nSec
param.span: 未經處理、高精確的時間戳記。

span.span: The raw, high-fidelity time stamp.

param.name: counterType
param.span: 物件，其指出使用此樣本做為快照 (Snapshot) 的計數器之型別。

span.span: A object that indicates the type of the counter for which this sample is a snapshot.

summary.span: 初始化 結構的新執行個體 (Instance)，並將 屬性設定為 0 (零)。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure and sets the property to 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式，讓初始的效能計數器樣本。Use this constructor to take an initial sample of the performance counter. 「 系統監視器提供這些參數的值會自動呼叫時方法第一次。The System Monitor supplies values for these parameters automatically when you call the method for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得樣本之後您已經拍攝的效能計數器的初始範例, 中使用這個建構函式。Use this constructor to take samples after you have already taken an initial sample of the performance counter. 「 系統監視器提供這些參數的值會自動呼叫時方法。The System Monitor supplies values for these parameters automatically when you call the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化新結構，在值中傳遞`rawValue`， `baseValue`， `counterFrequency`， `systemFrequency`， `timeStamp`， `timeStamp100nSec`， `counterType`，以及`counterTimeStamp`參數。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new structure, passing in values for the `rawValue`, `baseValue`, `counterFrequency`, `systemFrequency`, `timeStamp`, `timeStamp100nSec`, `counterType`, and `counterTimeStamp` parameters. 在建立後結構，此範例會顯示的屬性值主控台視窗中。After creating the structure, the example displays the property values for the in the console window.
